title: Monster iSplitter 1000 Y-Splitter with Volume Control/Mute for iPod and iPhone
description: iSplitter®for iPod®, iPad™, iPhone™, and moreShare Music and Movies with a FriendThe Monster iSplitter 1000 makes sharing music and movies on iPad, iPod, iPhone or other players easy and convenient. Just plug it into any standard headphone jack and connect two pairs of headphones. Now you and a friend can listen to music or watch a movie together. Two independent volume controls let both listeners set their own volume. The Monster iSplitter 1000 is also tough enough to go anywhere with you: in the car, on the plane, or in your bag, no problem.
